name: Reverse Alzheimer's
description:
Exploring the pathophysiology behind Alzheimer's disease

Reverse Alzheimer's is a first person perspective 3D game designed to draw public's attention to Alzheimer's disease. Players help the grandfather "he", to get back memories and prevent the development of Alzheimer's by interacting with neurons and molecules inside the brain. The visual and sound changes tell the reversion of progression and transition of grandfather's emotions. Everyone can acquire basic scientific knowledges of this terminal brain disorder.

Basic instructions

Read the texts in the game

Use WSADspace for movement and mouse for changing perspectives

Find the cue to next level

Thanks

Thank you for playing my "first video game".

This small game cannot be achieved without knowledges I learned from "small game studio" and the class of neurobiology of brain disorder.
